  28:   typedef struct packed
  29:   {
  30:     logic [rv64_funct7_width_gp-1:0]   funct7;
  31:     logic [rv64_reg_addr_width_gp-1:0] rs2_addr;

  33:     logic [rv64_funct3_width_gp-1:0]   funct3;

  41:     logic [rv64_funct3_width_gp-1:0]   funct3;
